channel.title: How do i make my own hamachi server? is it free?
channel.description: Ok...I downloaded Hamachi and i got a server name and password...but im stuck...How do you accually make the game? I have the name just not the game in my Hamachi account. Please help :( And one more question... Is making your own server free???
